titleStmt.title: Articles of impeachment of high treason, and other high crimes and offences, against William Earl of Powis, William Visount Stafford, Henry Lord Arundel of Wardour, William Lord Petre, and John Lord Bellasis, now prisoners in the Tower

notesStmt.note: Althought Wing dates this item c. 1684, all of the above mentioned prisoners were incarcerated in 1680 and, more importantly, Viscount Stafford was beheaded (for treason) in 1680.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
